name: WolfPG
description:
WolfPG is a wolfenstein3d-clone made for 7dfps / ProcJam 2020.

You are trapped in a procedurally generated castle and need to find your way out. But the way is blocked by security-doors that require specific keycards to pass. Find the keys and fight your way past those guards to make it to the exit-elevator. It will only take you up one floor at a time though :)

Design, concept, environment-textures, posing and voice acting done by my son (aged 8).

requires .Net Framework 4.6

This project is still work in progress and will get updated in the future. There are quite a few known bugs and features left to implement. Thanks for checking it out anyway!
